title: surrogate mining service
extract: Health Care Surrogate: In situations where a person cannot make medical decisions themselves, a health care surrogate will be the one to do so. Usually, this is a friend or relative of the person in medical distress. Legal Surrogate: This is another term for a health care surrogate.
extract_html: Health Care Surrogate: In situations where a person cannot make medical decisions themselves, a health care surrogate will be the one to do so. Usually, this is a friend or relative of the person in medical distress. Legal Surrogate: This is another term for a health care surrogate.
